actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Red Buttes Wilderness in the States of Oregon and California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Red Buttes Wilderness Act of 1979 - Designates the Kangaroo Roadless Area in the Rogue River, Klamath, and Siskiyou National Forests of California and Oregon as the Red Buttes Wilderness Area, a unit of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Red Buttes Wilderness in the States of Oregon and California, and for other purposes.
